ua.shevchuk.request

Interface RequestWrapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestingRequestWrapper, WorkingRequestWrapper

    public interface RequestWrapper
    An object that acts as a wrapper for the HttpServletRequest.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int getIntParameter(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the value of a HttpServletRequest parameter as int.
      java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the value of a HttpServletRequest parameter.
      java.lang.Object getSessionAttribute(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the value of an attribute of current HttpSession object associated with the request.
      void setAttribute(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets the value of a HttpServletRequest attribute.
      default void setAttributeErrorMessage(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the value of a HttpServletRequest attribute named "errorMessage".
      void setSessionAttribute(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets the value of an attribute of current HttpSession object associated with the request.

    • Method Detail

      • getIntParameter

        default int getIntParameter(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the value of a HttpServletRequest parameter as int.
        Parameters:
        name - a String specifying the name of the parameter
        Returns:
        a int representing the value of the parameter or 0 if the parameter does not exist or cannot be converted to int

      • getParameter

        java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the value of a HttpServletRequest parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - a String specifying the name of the parameter
        Returns:
        a String representing the value of the parameter, or null if the parameter does not exist

      • getSessionAttribute

        java.lang.Object getSessionAttribute(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the value of an attribute of current HttpSession object associated with the request.
        Parameters:
        name - a String specifying the name of the attribute
        Returns:
        an Object containing the value of the attribute, or null if the attribute does not exist

      • setAttribute

        void setAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the value of a HttpServletRequest attribute.
        Parameters:
        name - a String specifying the name of the attribute
        value - an Object containing the value of the attribute

      • setAttributeErrorMessage

        default void setAttributeErrorMessage(java.lang.String value)
        Sets the value of a HttpServletRequest attribute named "errorMessage".
        Parameters:
        value - a String specifying the value of the attribute

      • setSessionAttribute

        void setSessionAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the value of an attribute of current HttpSession object associated with the request.
        Parameters:
        name - a String specifying the name of the attribute
        value - an Object containing the value of the attribute
